content:
Your heel crunches as you step on a piece of glass, and as you look up, you spot the reason why: just beyond the path, a kinetic glass sculpture stands in ruin by the side of the stone bridge, its vague form held together in mid-air, blown apart into thousands of glittering shards. Whatever this sculpture once was, it's impossible to tell now. It's difficult to see from this distance, but if you had to guess, it looks like it was trampled by something enormous. You'll have to get closer to investigate further.

Clear the Broken Sculpture with   while each Ranger's   is on it to get a closer look, or simply clear it with   to pass it by.
